introduction: Filmed over 10 years, this is the story of how a courageous fishing community in India’s Gulf of Kutch joins forces with lawyers in Washington, D.C. to take on one of the world’s most powerful institutions, the World Bank Group, after it funded a coal-fired power plant on their coast.源自：https://www.bigskyfilmfest.org/festival/films-2024-view/fisherman_and_the_banker/
